Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Variations in F major, KV 54/547b

1788 · KV1 54 · KV2 Anh. 138a · KV3 547a/3 · KV6 547b

[IMSLP]

The theme is followed by five variations. The set is an arrangement of the final movement of the violin sonata in F major (KV 547), with the fourth variation of the six omitted. The end of the final variation is missing, but can be reconstructed easily from the sonata. The variations are often paired with the sonata in F major, KV Anh. 135/547a.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/26 · BA 4525-01 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Kurt von Fischer
  • Henle · HN 116 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Ewald Zimmermann
  • Henle · HN 117 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Ewald Zimmermann
  • Könemann · K 112 · Variationen · ed. István Máriássy

Duration: 7'

Difficulty: 2.5
